visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts 3D column chart to visualize the external trade in goods by country for Norway in 2023. The chart should include a title, styled axes and labels, a single data series representing total imports, and specific colors for the columns. Additional configurations should include 3D settings, chart margins, and a tooltip with a custom suffix.

title.text: External trade in goods by country, Norway 2023

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a 3D column chart that visualizes the external trade in goods by country for Norway in 2023. The chart includes a main title and a subtitle with a source link, both aligned to the left. The x-axis is categorical, with labels styled to be slightly skewed in 3D and with a larger font size. The y-axis has a title indicating the unit of measurement (NOK million) with some margin for better readability. The tooltip displays the value with a custom suffix 'MNOK'. The chart is configured to have a 3D effect with specific angles and depth. The data series represents 'Total imports' with values for various countries, including a null value for 'Unspecified' to indicate missing data.
